peeragogical-action-review.title: Peeragogy Progress PAR 5 (2018)
peeragogical-action-review.intention-review: We prepare a submission for the 2018 Connected Learning Summit.
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: We have a dialogue about the “what’s next” steps from our pattern catalogue, asking what makes the Peeragogy project a sustainable learning community.
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened-perspectives: At the last minute, we realize we need to anonymize the paper. The content is too much about “us” to stand up well to those changes.
peeragogical-action-review.learnings-changes: We subsequently revise the text into a successful submission for Anticipation 2019.
peeragogical-action-review.what-else-should-change-going-forward: We should review the work that was accepted for Connected Learning Summit 2018 with more care and think about a future submission.
